sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-col cols="12" sm="6" md="3">
    <v-text-field
      @focus="searchClosed = false"
      
      class="expanding-search mt-1"
      :class="{ closed: searchClosed }"
      placeholder="Search"
      prepend-inner-icon="mdi-magnify"
      label="Filled"
      filled
      dense
    ></v-text-field>
  </v-col>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      searchClosed: true,
    };
  },
};
</script>

<style lang="sass">
.expanding-search
    .v-input__slot
        &:before, &:after
            border-color: transparent !important
    &.close
        max-width: 45px
</style>
